name: Paddy Wagon YQT (Inside The Port Arthur Curling Club), The
address: Address: 214 Egan Street (Inside The Port Arthur Curling Club)
text:
Smash Burger Menu
Smash & Grab Combo $17.50 Solo $13.50 Two beef paddys, caramelized onions, American Cheese, dill pickle and The Paddy Wagon's should-be-illegal BOLO sauce topped with lettuce on a toasted bun.

Hawaii Five-0 Combo $18.00 Solo $13.50 A single beef paddy on a toasted bun, melted cheddar cheese charred pineapple, and caramelized onions topped with teri(yaki), juicy bacon, and lettuce.

Pepper Jack Smash Combo $19.50 Solo $15.00 Two savoury smash paddys topped with melted jalapeño Monterey Jack cheese, crispy applewood bacon, caramelized and French's crispy onions with a drizzle of raspberry chipotle BBQ sauce.

Misdemeanor Mushroom Combo $20.50 Solo $16.00 Two smash paddys, topped with white truffle aioli, caramelized onions, cremini mushrooms, bacon & provolone cheese.

Big Kahuna Smash Combo $21.50 Solo $17.00 Three smash paddys, topped with American cheddar cheese, bacon, ketchup, caramelized onions, mustard and pickles.

Juvenile Smash Combo $14.50 Solo $10.00 Single smash paddy topped with American cheddar cheese, ketchup, caramelized onions, mustard and pickles.

Mad Greek Smash Combo $19.50 Solo $15.00 Two smashed patties served on a fresh bakery bun, garnished with purple onions, crisp romaine lettuce, juicy tomatoes, flavorful feta cheese, and our MAD GREEK sauce.

Sides and Fries
Last Meal Poutine Full $14.00 Half $11.00 Our classic poutine with a Philly twist, fried green peppers onions cheese curds, and The Paddy Wagon's A.P.B. sauce (Alabama white).

Poutine Full $11.00 Half $9.00 Our delicious homemade gravy over crinkle-cut fries and cheese curds.

Greek Fries Full $12.00 Half $8.00 Crispy crinkle cut fries dowsed in greek seasoning, topped with feta cheese and our house made greek sauce.

Truffle Fries Full $12.00 Half $8.00 Crispy crinkle cut fries, topped with fresh parmesan and chives, served with our truffle aioli.

Chicken Strips $14.99 Tender chicken breast strips, lightly breaded and fried until golden. Served with a choice of dipping sauces, these strips are a delightful option for those looking for a hearty yet simple dish.
